parameters.query: =SELECT b.id, b.tenant_id, b.client_final_id, b.numero_bdc, b.date_bdc, b.date_validite, b.montant_ht, b.montant_ttc, b.tva_taux, b.description, b.mode_paiement, b.statut, b.invoice_id, b.created_at, b.updated_at, c.id as client_id, c.nom as client_nom, c.email as client_email, c.telephone as client_telephone FROM bon_commandes b LEFT JOIN client_finals c ON b.client_final_id = c.id WHERE b.id = '{{ $json.bdcId }}' AND b.tenant_id = '{{ $json.tenantId }}'
=SELECT id, bon_commande_id, code_article, designation, quantite, prix_unitaire_ht, total_ht, ordre FROM bon_commande_lines WHERE bon_commande_id = '{{ $json.bdcId }}' ORDER BY ordre
=SELECT id, numero_facture, statut FROM invoices WHERE id = '{{ $('05. Get Bon').first().invoice_id }}'{% if !$('05. Get Bon').first().invoice_id %} AND FALSE{% endif %}
